Question
========

Often when performing an ANCOVA, a model with an interaction between the covariate and factor is estimated. Why? 
Answerlist
----------
* To keep the covariate "constant.
* To estimate adjusted (adjusted) averages.
* Because including this interaction leads to more explained variance.
* To test an assumption.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
